fields.name: Instruction Modes
fields.value:
`HADDPD xmm1, xmm2/m128`
`VHADDPD xmm1,xmm2, xmm3/m128`
`VHADDPD ymm1, ymm2, ymm3/m256`

fields.name: Description
fields.value: Adds the double-precision floating-point values in the high and low quadwords of the destination operand and stores the result in the low quadword of the destination operand.

fields.name: ​
fields.value: Adds the double-precision floating-point values in the high and low quadwords of the source operand and stores the result in the high quadword of the destination operand.

fields.name: ​
fields.value: In 64-bit mode, use of the REX.R prefix permits this instruction to access additional registers (XMM8-XMM15).

fields.name: ​
fields.value: See Figure 3-16 for HADDPD; see Figure 3-17 for VHADDPD.
